Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Reroute near 130th/King Drive
ShortDescription: 34 South Michigan buses rrtd SB via Michigan,115th, Bishop Ford Exp-way & 130th; NB via 130th, Bishop Ford Exp-way & 115th due to blockage nr 130th/King Drive.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near 130th/King Drive.

  • Southbound buses will operate via Michigan,115th, Bishop Ford Expressway & 130th.
  • Northbound buses will operate via 130th, Bishop Ford Expressway & 115th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier mechanical problems at O'Hare. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier mechanical problems on a train at O'Hare.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
